name: Vegan Whole Wheat Date Ladoos
description: For a sweet holiday treat that is naturally sweetened, try my Whole Wheat Date Ladoo recipe. A wholesome vegan twist on a traditional Indian sweet made with whole wheat flour, almond flour, nuts, and dates! Soy-free + Gluten-free option.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup whole wheat flour (I use atta )
1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom or seeds from 2 green cardamom pods crushed lightly
2 tablespoons chopped raw or roasted unsalted cashews
8-10  dates (soft medjool dates are the best)

recipeInstructions.text: Roast your wheat flour in a skillet over medium heat for 10-15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Roast your wheat flour in a skillet over medium heat for 10-15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Keep stirring so that the flour doesn't burn. Stir occasionally for the first 5 minutes. It will get evenly hot and will tend to burn faster after 5 mins so keep stirring frequently then
recipeInstructions.name: Keep stirring so that the flour doesn't burn. Stir occasionally for the first 5 minutes. It will get evenly hot and will tend to burn faster after 5 mins so keep stirring frequently then

recipeInstructions.text: Once the flour starts to smell fragrant and has changed color to a significantly darker shade evenly, you can add the flax meal, almond flour, 1/8 teaspoon salt, and mix and add in the vegan butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the flour starts to smell fragrant and has changed color to a significantly darker shade evenly, you can add the flax meal, almond flour, 1/8 teaspoon salt, and mix and add in the vegan butter.

recipeInstructions.text: Continue to roast for another 3-4 minutes over medium heat and then take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Continue to roast for another 3-4 minutes over medium heat and then take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dates and the cardamom to a food processor and process until the dates break down.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dates and the cardamom to a food processor and process until the dates break down.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add in the cashews and wheat flour mixture and process until the mixture is well combined into fat crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add in the cashews and wheat flour mixture and process until the mixture is well combined into fat crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Check to see if you can make it into even ladoo balls.
recipeInstructions.name: Check to see if you can make it into even ladoo balls.

recipeInstructions.text: If it's not sticking as much, add 1 or 2 more dates or a few sprinkles of water and then process again. Shape into balls of preferred size and store.
recipeInstructions.name: If it's not sticking as much, add 1 or 2 more dates or a few sprinkles of water and then process again. Shape into balls of preferred size and store.

recipeInstructions.text: You can store this on the counter for up to 5 days or refrigerate for a longer life for up to a month.
recipeInstructions.name: You can store this on the counter for up to 5 days or refrigerate for a longer life for up to a month.
